name: Endangered Species of Canada
content:
Description: A list of Canada's endangered mammals, birds, reptiles, amphibians, fish, arthropods and mollusks.

[Source](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Wildlife_Species_at_Risk_(Canada))

Columns:

* Scientific name (string): the scientific names of the animals. 
* Common name (string): the common name and relative locations of the animals. 
* Class (string): the classifications (mammal, bird, reptile etc.) of the animals. 
* Conservation status (string): the status of the animal (extirpated, endangered, threatened, of special concern)
